devcalc.conversionRange.description: Controls the conversion range when selected or focused.
devcalc.conversionRange.word.description: Convert only the selected or focused value.
devcalc.conversionRange.line.description: Convert all values in the selected or focused line.
devcalc.screenWidth.description: Controls the screen width in pixels.
devcalc.enableCommonScreenWidths.descrip: When enabled, using shortcut key or clicking the status bar item will toggles the screen width among common options.
devcalc.commonScreenWidths.description: Configure common screen widths in pixels.
devcalc.rootElementFontSize.description: Controls the font size of the root element in pixels.
devcalc.keepDecimalPlaces.description: Controls the maximum number of decimal places to keep after conversion.
devcalc.ignoreSmallerValues.description: Controls the range of pixel values to ignore (-n ≤ px ≤ n will not be converted).
devcalc.enableAutocompleteConversion.des: Controls autocomplete conversion when typing pixel value
devcalc.enableLineAnnotations.descriptio: Controls px annotations to be displayed on selected or focused lines with conversion type values.
devcalc.statusBarItemAlignment.primary.d: Place the status bar item on the left.
devcalc.statusBarItemAlignment.secondary: Place the status bar item on the right.
devcalc.statusBarItemPriority.descriptio: Controls status bar item priority, higher values mean it should be shown more to the left.
devcalc.px2dev.title: Convert px to vw/rem/rpx/%
devcalc.dev2px.title: Convert vw/rem/rpx/% to px
devcalc.px2dev2px.title: DevCalc
devcalc.updateConversionData.title: Update conversion data
